channel.title: *NEVER SOLVED I BET YOU CANT!* Glitch when attacking
channel.description:
[size=15pt][/size]IF YOU DONT KNOW SQUAT ABOUT CODING DONT LOOK BELOW OR POST HERE.
it attacks over and over again without pauses between attacks i got video proof.. and i have no clue how to set the time delay between attacks.. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rPPFUsjyPz8

item.title: *NEVER SOLVED I BET YOU CANT!* Glitch when attacking
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

I figured it out. You must change the “reset animation” number instead of the others. for all the ones that dont have reset animation you must add this under wepdelay

resetanim = 15;

And 15 should be 1.5 seconds i believe. I tested it with the whip, the dragon 2h and the dragon dagger. So trust me it works.

Read full topic

item.title: *NEVER SOLVED I BET YOU CANT!* Glitch when attacking
item.dc:creator: @BloodyBones BloodyBones
item.description:
@BloodyBones wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:10, topic:87714”][quote author=Nwfd1025 link=topic=128447.msg1250392#msg1250392 date=1178071390]
… pimpscape is a BIG rip from Jorsascape…

Pimpscape doesnt even deserver that name TBH… PimpScape is PhoneScape also :S
[/quote]

yes… just like dell stated.

Phonescape is based off pimpscape, i would know cause i help to make it lol…

ok anyways this is very easy to fix just go to your attack timers void, if you dont know were that is its probobly under case 185, now, look for something like “wepdelay() or pkingdelay()”, there should be some numbers between the (), just change it to 15, its exactly like runescape, change it for every weapon you use for your server.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: *NEVER SOLVED I BET YOU CANT!* Glitch when attacking
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“Nwfd1025, post:8, topic:87714”]… pimpscape is a BIG rip from Jorsascape…

Pimpscape doesnt even deserver that name TBH… PimpScape is PhoneScape also :S[/quote]

Phonescape is based off pimpscape, i would know cause i help to make it lol…

ok anyways this is very easy to fix just go to your attack timers void, if you dont know were that is its probobly under case 185, now, look for something like “wepdelay() or pkingdelay()”, there should be some numbers between the (), just change it to 15, its exactly like runescape, change it for every weapon you use for your server.

Read full topic
